reviews.review_text: We went to Sonic during our last day of Stay at Goa around noon and ordered like a brunch for a family of 5 people. The Sonic overlooks the beach n the ocean, the view was marvelous and the weather with a cool breeze. We ordered a pizzas grilled chicken and veg manchurian. It was a fabulous ambience and we had a good time and clicked pictures of the panoramic view of the ocean and the sunset. Go for this restaurant cum bar when u visit Goa.

Very nice restaurant with a beautiful view of the sea, the fish king is prepared in an amazing way. Thanks to the chef. The dessert is also very good. Thanks pravesh  for your wonderful service and the advice you gave regarding the food.

Located right on the picturesque shoreline, Sonic offers a delightful dining experience with the soothing sound of waves as your backdrop. This seaside restaurant has quickly become a favorite spot for both locals and tourists, thanks to its inviting ambiance and mouthwatering menu.

The setting is truly unbeatable. As you walk in, you're greeted with a stunning view of the ocean, making it the perfect spot for a relaxing meal. The decor is a blend of coastal charm and modern elegance, with no windows that let in plenty of natural light and offer breathtaking views of the sea. Whether you choose to sit indoors or on the outdoor patio, youâ€™re guaranteed a fantastic view.

Sonic specializes in serving a variety of pizzas, pastas,shakes, and a bar ensuring there's something for everyone. The pizzas are a highlight, with a thin, crispy crust and an array of toppings that cater to all tastes, from classic margherita to gourmet combinations. The pasta dishes are equally impressive, featuring rich, flavorful sauces and perfectly cooked pasta. To complement your meal, the restaurant offers a range of delicious shakes, from classic chocolate and vanilla to more adventurous flavors like strawberry cheesecake and salted caramel.

A meal at Sonic is reasonably priced, costing between 1000 to 1500 per person. This includes a generous portion of food and one of their signature shakes, making it a great value for the quality and setting.

In summary, Sonic is a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy delicious food with a view. The combination of seaside charm, tasty dishes, and reasonable prices makes it a standout choice for dining by the shore. Whether you're in the mood for a casual meal or a special occasion, Sonic delivers a memorable experience every time.
